name: The Marcus Illusion (A TSP PARODY GAME)
name_original: The Marcus Illusion (A TSP PARODY GAME)
description:
hi this is a parody game of The Stanley Parable which you should download right now.

marcus was sitting alone in his office when he realised he was really thirsty and needed juice.

this game has:

  • funni narrator man.
  • funni choices.
  • funni 15 endings.
  • funni secret true ending.
  • funni epic music and art or something.

just download it plees
